6// ImageMtl.h:
7// Defines the class interface for ImageMtl, implementing ImageImpl.
8//
9
10#ifndef LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_IMAGEMTL_H
11#define LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_IMAGEMTL_H
12
13#include "libANGLE/renderer/ImageImpl.h"
14#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_resources.h"
15
16namespace rx
17{
18
19class DisplayMtl;
20
21class TextureImageSiblingMtl : public ExternalImageSiblingImpl
22{
23 public:
24 TextureImageSiblingMtl(EGLClientBuffer buffer);
25 ~TextureImageSiblingMtl() override;
26
27 static bool ValidateClientBuffer(const DisplayMtl *display, EGLClientBuffer buffer);
28
29 egl::Error initialize(const egl::Display *display) override;
30 void onDestroy(const egl::Display *display) override;
31
32 // ExternalImageSiblingImpl interface
33 gl::Format getFormat() const override;
34 bool isRenderable(const gl::Context *context) const override;
35 bool isTexturable(const gl::Context *context) const override;
36 gl::Extents getSize() const override;
37 size_t getSamples() const override;
38
39 const mtl::TextureRef &getTexture() const { return mNativeTexture; }
40 const mtl::Format &getFormatMtl() const { return mFormat; }
41
42 private:
43 angle::Result initImpl(DisplayMtl *display);
44
45 EGLClientBuffer mBuffer;
46 gl::Format mGLFormat;
47 mtl::Format mFormat;
48
49 bool mRenderable = false;
50 bool mTextureable = false;
51
52 mtl::TextureRef mNativeTexture;
53};
54
55class ImageMtl : public ImageImpl
56{
57 public:
58 ImageMtl(const egl::ImageState &state, const gl::Context *context);
59 ~ImageMtl() override;
60 void onDestroy(const egl::Display *display) override;
61
62 egl::Error initialize(const egl::Display *display) override;
63
64 angle::Result orphan(const gl::Context *context, egl::ImageSibling *sibling) override;
65
66 const mtl::TextureRef &getTexture() const { return mNativeTexture; }
67 gl::TextureType getImageTextureType() const { return mImageTextureType; }
68 uint32_t getImageLevel() const { return mImageLevel; }
69 uint32_t getImageLayer() const { return mImageLayer; }
70
71 private:
72 gl::TextureType mImageTextureType;
73 uint32_t mImageLevel = 0;
74 uint32_t mImageLayer = 0;
75
76 mtl::TextureRef mNativeTexture;
77};
78} // namespace rx
79
80#endif /* LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_IMAGEMTL_H */
81
